text: Red Fields is a 2019 Israeli drama film directed by Keren Yedaya. It was screened in the Contemporary World Cinema section at the 2019 Toronto International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Neta Elkayam as Mamy * Ami Abu as Nissim * Riki Gal as Batia * Yuval Banai as Yaki ==References== ==External links== * Category:2019 films Category:2019 drama films Category:Israeli films Category:Israeli drama films Category:Hebrew-language films
title: Red Fields
